document.full_text: u.s. safety regulators have told broadway theaters to update their emergency plans, a reminder that the aging buildings near new york's times square may need to evacuate as some did during a failed bomb plot a year ago.
document.title: u.s. warns broadway theaters on security threats
lines_and_colors: u.s. safety regulators have told broadway theaters to update their emergency plans, a reminder that the aging buildings near new york's times square may need to evacuate as some did during a failed bomb plot a year ago.
